attributes.action: Refuse a second referendum to remain in the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
This is the link to the petition which is undergoing.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215
attributes.background: A petition to remain in the EU has been launched. Us, the majority have decided it's right to take back control of our country, democracy and our borders and want to refuse the minority the right to take this freedom from us.
